page.title: 08COMMUNICATIONS
page.content:
A single road from the main A 3O75 passes through Cubert ending at Holywell. A network of narrow roads and lanes links the smaller hamlets. Cornwall Bus and Coachways provide one bus service daily throughout the year. A private coach company also operates a daily service to Newquay and Truro. During school terms the schedule caters for transporting children to and from Cubert School from the adjacent village of Crantock where there is no school. However, the majority of residents rely on and use their own private transport.
There is one daily postal delivery and two collections (not Sundays). There is one public telephone box in the square at Cubert and one at Holywell.
